Vote - ReturnToSender - This metadata record is empty and the accompanying Text record is likewise empty. When you receive this file as "ReturnToSender", please open it up go to "Overview" and at the bottom of the window click "Delete" and then delete it from your editing publications. This simply clears your file and has no effect upon SoSOL / papyri.info at large. Thank you.
Copied from digital text during March training session in London.

div.ab:
ἔτους λ Ἁθὺρ ιϛ. τέτακται ἐπὶ
τὸ ἐν τῆι πόλει λογευτήριον Πᾶσις
ὁ Σεμθέους ἐκ τῆς πόλεως εἰς
κθ λαχανείας εἰς τὸν Ἁθὺρ
τρεῖςδραχμὰς δεκατρεῖς δύο ὀβολούς.
Demotic
